sourcesContent:
const defaultPlaying = false;

function playReducer(state = defaultPlaying, { type, payload }) {
    switch (type) {
        case 'PLAY_STOP':
            return payload;
        default:
            return state;
    }
}

const songsReducer = () => {
    return [
        {
            id: 1,
            name: "Danny Don't You KNow",
            explicit: false,
            author: "Ninja Sex Party",
            album: "Cool Patrol",
            duration: new Date(0, 0, 0, 0, 2, 29),
            like: false
        },
        {
            id: 2,

            like: false
        },
        {

        {

        },

        },
        {

            duration: new Date(0, 0, 0, 0, 3, 15),
            like: true
        },
        {
            id: 8,
            name: "Addict",

            author: "Silva Hound, Michael Kovach",

            duration: new Date(0, 0, 0, 0, 3, 26),

        },
        {
            id: 9,
            name: "Kingdom",

        {

        },
        {
            id: 12,

        {

    ];
  };

export default playReducer;
